General.Name: Zhejiang Kingland Pipeline and Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Kingland Pipeline and Technologies Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells oil and gas pipelines, and civilian pipelines in China. The company's principal products include galvanized steel, steel-plastic composite, spiral submerged arc welded, straight submerged arc welded, straight seam welded, stainless steel, urban construction pipes, FBE/2PE/3PE coated, PP-R/PE pipes, and fittings, hot-dip galvanized pipe/black, and other energy construction pipes, as well as SAWL and HFW pipes. It provides products for use in water supply, drainage, fire protection, gas, oil, and natural gas, transportation, construction, communication, and UHV power towers. The company exports its products to approximately 30 countries. Zhejiang Kingland Pipeline and Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Huzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 388, Qufu South Road, Huzhou, China, 313000
